Reviews.Title: Only a little misleading...
Reviews.Author: Michael Mills
Reviews.Content: This camera isn't as big as the one that I am replacing (due to it getting nicked on holiday).  I figured it wouldn't have nearly the same quality, but it's size and simplicity seem to be just what my wife wanted.  She got that and a great picture quality to boot.The things that I like most about this camera are it's size and ability to be carried around the wrist (less likely to be left somewhere).The things I like least about this camera are the lack of built in rechargeable batteries, the lack of a way to turn off the LCD preview when you want to just use the manual viewfinder.I bought rechargeable AA's and have yet to need to recharge/replace them, so maybe the LCD isn't that big of a deal... and neither is the rechargeable part.Good purchase.  Momma is happy... everybody's happy.

Reviews.Title: Nice point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: Bruce V. Backlund
Reviews.Content: The HP has a image quality that I would equate to a one time use 35mm camera. I wanted a carry around camera that was ready instantly and without a optical zoom this camera fits my needs. Camera is user friendly and easy to learn. Software was OK. It has a viewfinder along with a standard lcd on the back which I throught was a little dim. My overall opinion was while this was certainly not in the 250-500 dollar range of quality digital cameras and should not be for the 70 dollers I paid for it, it is a nice compact digital camera, take along type, that fits my needs. Flash quality is good for it's price. I thought the software was ok, but took a long time to put the program on my computer. I do recommend this camera for anyone wanting a small take along camera of very good quality.

Reviews.Title: Good entry level camera
Reviews.Author: H. Metcalf
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 12-year-old son and I'm very impressed with how easily he has been able to take good photos.  I've been a long-time HP camera fan, although I've purchased two other brands recently, and this camera does not disappoint.  Good value for the money, easy to use, software is straightforward and easy, overall a great camera for the entry-level photographer.  Small enough to fit in your pocket.  Great deal, and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: We love our first digital camera!!
Reviews.Author: Chad Oberholtzer
Reviews.Content: My wife and I are always a bit behind the times with technology, and we've been using an old-school camera with film for years.  This Christmas, I decided to treat my wife to this digital camera, though I had no idea what I was buying.  As it turns out, I got lucky, as this has been exactly what we needed.Obviously, if you're looking at this camera, you understand the digital camera concept.  We have absolutely loved the ability to discard bad pictures, transfer our pictures onto our computer, crop and adjust them, make slide shows, e-mail them to friends, and all of the other perks that come with digital pictures.  What we did not expect was how well this cheap model would work.The quality of the pictures is fabulous.  The camera is extremely user-friendly.  My wife constantly comments on how amazingly light it is.  The only complaint is that the resolution gets pretty crummy when you zoom in, but that's a small problem for such a cost-effective camera.I'm sure that this camera doesn't have many of the bells and whistles of more expensive options.  We can't send e-mail through our camera, it doesn't double as a pocketknife, and it can't drive our car when we get tired.  But it does everything we need and more.  I am happy to recommend this camera to anyone interested in a high-quality, basic digital camera, especially as an entry into the digital world.  It has made me irritated that we didn't make this investment sooner!!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Goldie M. Worrell
Reviews.Content: I purchase this camera for my daughter for Christmas and she love it. The camera is the perfect size to fit in her pocketbook.

Reviews.Title: bad camera
Reviews.Author: Glenn H. Randall
Reviews.Content: this purchase was totally unsatisfactory. the camera arrived devoid of all peripherals-users manual, USB cable and arrived devoid of the expected commercial packaging (LIKE YOU MIGHT EXPECT FROM A USED CAMERA ON EBAY). In addition, the camera was defective- the lithium battery did not properly "seat"- so the camera could not function in any capacity.The only good aspect to the purchase- after many happy Amazon purchases this was my first opportunity to check out their return practices- which were flawless! thank you Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Gamzi Digital sent me an open box camera
Reviews.Author: JurassicGuy
Reviews.Content: I like the camera just fine ... but Gamzi Digital did a little bit of a bait and switch ... only thing in the box was the camera ... no batteries like promised ... no manual ... no cables ... no nothing ... on the invoice the product was labeled (new - open box) .... if they were gonna give me an open box camera it should have been sold that way!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Super camera for beginners.
Reviews.Author: M. Harwood
Reviews.Content: I was very wary of purchasing a digital camera. All the options, styles, and what the heck are pixels and what do they have to do with pictures, anyway? Well it turns out that the 5 megapixels are great for my small to medium photos. The battery lasts for a while, even longer if you take measures to save the battery. Even though I do not find it hard to figure out how to use technology, I think even my mom could figure out how to use this. The buttons and menus are so easy, and it even explains what the options mean and how they affect your pictures. My only issue is that I didn't know I had to buy a memory card for it, so there you go: Buy a memory card and shoot away!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for first time users.
Reviews.Author: T. Griffin "Mother of 5"
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera for first time users. Forget those Disney cheapo's spend a few extra bucks and buy this one. My child has learned this whole camera on her own. I would recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: very good!
Reviews.Author: Jung Eun Jung "Musician"
Reviews.Content: I like this item very much. I feel so licky thatI have this. Thanks,EJ

Reviews.Title: what you need.......
Reviews.Author: C. Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: its what you need, but not what you want, work real good for pic. but not for the video, its ok for the price.

Reviews.Title: luv it!
Reviews.Author: VITA "V"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for a fam member, they loved it. I was told it takes great pictures, and it works well, u dont evne need a memory card it has a built in memory that holds enough pictures, but ifu take lots of pics then u might want to get a memory card... The price is good. the screen is small but its big enough to see ur image.

Reviews.Title: Not what we thought we were getting
Reviews.Author: DLWRIGHT
Reviews.Content: This camera is not the quality we thought we were buying.  It's zoom is very minimal.  No sound on the video it takes.  It was not what we wanted and we are disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Very Dissapointed!!!
Reviews.Author: *~*ProudMommy*~*
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera based on the reviews. Now unless it was a manufaturer's defect, this camera was a piece of junk! Simple, but horrible grainy, blurry photos. I would not recommend this camera to anyone looking for a decent point and shoot camera that takes quality photos!

Reviews.Title: Good price good product
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Buzzie "The Book Men"
Reviews.Content: Bought for christmas Jesus Birthday and for what I want it for its a good price and product
